An explicit Click-Through Visual Novel about a good girl who wants to seduce a bad guy for a wild night in his Pleasure Den.
Story description
Everybody believes it’s easy to get good sex when you look so hot…
And it’s usually true.
But life wasn’t so generous with our dear Larissa.
She only had bad experiences with not-so-bad boys…and some cold and lonely dates with her old vibrator…
So it’s no wonder she decided to skip sex altogether and focus on her studies instead.
…
But everything changes when she meets this hot and interesting guy for dinner and he tells her all about the secret Pleasure Den he has in his basement.
Well well well
Will our good girl finally get the best night of her life?
Will Kyle manage to turn her into the bad girl she desperately wants to be?
Follow her story and find out on your own.
